subject: Tennis
Friendship
Television
lead_paragraph: John McEnroe, the brassy New Yorker, and Bjorn Borg, the cool Swede, had a chance to return to their old rivalry in a charity match on Randall’s Island, with McEnroe winning in a single-set match.
snippet: John McEnroe, the brassy New Yorker, and Bjorn Borg, the cool Swede, had a chance to return to their old rivalry in a charity match on Randall’s Island, with McEnroe winning in a single-set match.
